content.title: DG Khan: Two dead, 1 critically injured in attack on cement factory van - SUCH TV
content.desc: Unidentified motorcyclists in Dera Ghazi Khan opened fire on a cement factory's security van on Friday, killing two and critically injuring another, according to ...

content.title: Terrorist killed, two troops injured in DG Khan clash: ISPR - The News International
Residents live in fear as HIV/AIDS grips DG Khan - The Express Tribune
content.desc: In a startling revelation, HIV/AIDS infection cases are on the rise in Dera Ghazi Khan District as 455 people have died due to lack of treatment facilities.
